A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson has delivered what is now my favorite Star Wars film. The Last Jedi is a powerhouse of storytelling that subverts unnecessary tropes\, ignores pointless fan-theories and gifts characters we love with the most necessary and powerful character development in the entire saga. The film is just as much a commentary on today's youth\, society and government as it is a fantastic\, fun-filled\, action-packed and character driven story. Complete with one of the coolest lightsaber battles ever put to screen.  Despite a bit of prequel-esque familiarity in a scene or two\, The Last Jedi has not only given us a beautiful addition to the Star Wars saga\, but a beautiful film regardless of the franchise baggage. We'll be talking about this one for decades to come!
